---
# https://quarto.org/docs/reference/globs.html
# title: "Posts"
listing:
  - id: projects
    contents: "posts/Projects/*/*.qmd"
    sort: date desc
    type: grid
    grid-item-border: false
    grid-columns: 1
    page-size: 1
    max-items: 5
    image-height: 250px
    image-placeholder: placeholder_1.gif
    max-description-length: 250
    categories: unnumbered
    fields: [title, subtitle, description, date, categories, image]

  - id: posts
    contents: 
    - posts
    - "!posts/Projects/all_projects.qmd" # removes the project listing page from posts
    - "!posts/Projects/*/*.qmd" # removes the big post page from posts (highlighted at top)
    sort: 
    - "date desc"
    - custom-num desc
    type: default
    #  categories: true
    sort-ui: true
    filter-ui: true
    categories: unnumbered
    fields: [title, description, date, custom-blank,  custom-series, custom-num, reading-time, categories]

page-layout: full

title-block-banner: false
title-block-banner-color: "#e28743"
---
